articles.author: Christopher Mims
articles.title: Self-Driving Big Rigs Are Coming. Is America Ready?
articles.description: Autonomous trucks that mostly stick to highways could make sense, both technologically and economically, in ways robotaxis have not. The goal is better-than-human, but not perfect, autonomous driving; jobs are probably on the line.
articles.content: Some day in the next few years, if youre on the right stretch of highway in Americas Sunbelt, you are likely to have the disconcerting experience of pulling alongside a fully loaded semi truck, glanc… [+502 chars]

articles.title: The Crypto Party Is Over
articles.description: The cryptocurrency industry was built on swagger, enthusiasm and optimism. All three are in short supply these days, as losses and layoffs mount.
